title: 1. This Order may be cited as the National Treasury Management Agency
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the National Treasury Management Agency
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the National Treasury Management Agency 

(Amendment) Act 2014 (Commencement) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited national treasury management agency (amendment) act 2014 (commencement) order 2021

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the National Treasury Management Agency
heading: 2. The 31st day of December 2021 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 31st day of December 2021 is appointed as the day on which the 
the National Treasury Management Agency 

following provisions of 
(Amendment) Act 2014 (No. 23 of 2014) come into operation: 

(a) 

section 5(1) and Schedule 1, insofar as those provisions relate to 
the amendments specified in - 

(i) 

item 1(b) of Part 2, 

(ii) 

items 2(b) and (c), 4, 7(b) and (c), 9(b) and (c), 10(b) and 
12(b), (c) and (d) of Part 4, and 

(iii) Part 8, 

of that Schedule, 

(b) 

section 5(2) and Schedule 2, insofar as those provisions relate to 
the amendments specified in - 

(i) 

item 1(b) of Part 2, 

(ii) Part 4, and 

(iii) 

items 1(a) and 2(b) of Part 6, 

of that Schedule, 

(c) 

section 6(a) and (d), 

(d) 

section 50, 

(e) Chapter 4 of Part 7, insofar as that Chapter relates to the 

provisions specified in paragraph (f), and 

(f) 

paragraphs 15 and 17 of Schedule 4. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 26th November, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [608] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

18 November, 2021. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [608]
